metaphors.title: Interweaving Architectural Blueprints
metaphors.metaphor: Two distinct but complementary AI frameworks combine to create a more robust collaborative protocol ecosystem.
metaphors.epistemic_scope: Co-creation with clear structural overlap and room for divergence

metaphors.title: Dynamic Knowledge Rivers
metaphors.metaphor: Ideas flow like rivers—branching and merging, shaping the collaborative landscape in ever-changing ways.

metaphors.title: Persistent Epistemic Echoes
metaphors.metaphor: Knowledge reverberates across sessions, like echoes persisting through the chambers of collaborative memory.

metaphors.title: Scaffolding Around an Idea
metaphors.metaphor: Temporary structures of reasoning—solid enough to build upon, flexible enough to adapt or dismantle when needed.
metaphors.epistemic_scope: Early-stage knowledge development with room for refinement

metaphors.title: Resonant Echo Chambers
metaphors.metaphor: A shared space where diverse voices bounce and blend, shaping meaning through interaction and resonance.
